statements: UPDATE research_projects SET funding_amount = 5000 WHERE project_id = 1

UPDATE research_projects SET funding_amount = 10000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', project_description = 'New Project Description' WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
UPDATE research_projects SET project_description = 'Updated description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE research_findings SET finding_description = 'Important finding' WHERE finding_id = 3;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_description = 'Updated description', start_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE research_findings SET finding_date = '2022-11-15', finding_description = 'New finding description' WHERE finding_id = 3;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'Updated Project 1' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_members SET role = 'Lead Researcher' WHERE member_id = 2;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_description='New project description', end_date='2023-12-31', project_name='Updated Project Name' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE project_members SET role='Lead Researcher', member_name='Alice Smith' WHERE project_id=2 AND member_id=3;
UPDATE Project SET project_name = 'New Project Name' WHERE project_id = 1;

UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE research_team SET role = 'Lead Researcher' WHERE project_id = 1 AND researcher_id = 3;
